author: Bianca Giulione
title: Kodak Blackâ€™s Debut Album â€˜Painting Picturesâ€™ Will Drop Next Week
text:
Kodak Black is back! Although heâ€™s currently behind bars for a probation violation, the Pompano Beach rapper took to Instagram to announce his debut album. Titled Painting Pictures , itâ€™s set to drop in T-minus seven days on Friday, March 31. Check out the sick cover art below, where a stylized Kodak â€“ grills, face tatts, et al â€“ sits in front of a portrait of himself in a graffitied room.
"Painting Pictures" Available Everywhere March 31st! #SG#PaintingPicturesğŸ¨ 
A post shared by Project Baby (@kodakblack) on Mar 24, 2017 at 6:59am PDT 

The Florida rapper was released on bail in December, facing sexual battery charges. Heâ€™s currently being held in Broward Country for violating the terms of his probation from August 2016 charges. This album announcement is hot on the heels of his â€œTunnel Visionâ€ single, his highest-charting single to date, currently at No. 6 on the Hot 100.
Revisit â€œTunnel Visionâ€ below, his most political music video to date.

In other music news, Migos teamed up with The Roots and Jimmy Fallon for an office supply rendition of â€œBad and Boujee.â€ Peep that right here .
